snippet.title: WyndBlast GamePlay Trailer
snippet.description:
Linktree (contains all the official links) : https://linktr.ee/wyndblast
Website: https://wyndblast.com/
Whitepaper: https://whitepaper.wyndblast.com/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/wyndblast
Discord: https://discord.gg/wyndblast
Telegram: https://t.me/wyndblast
Medium: https://medium.com/@wyndblast

Wyndblast is a play and earns multiplayer cooperative game built on the Avalanche blockchain. The game takes place in the Chronica Sola Verse, a mystical land where players can take control of Wynds (dragons), recruit Riders, forge equipment, fight enemies (PVE) and compete with one another (PVP).

The Wynds, Riders, and the equipment, are NFT assets owned by players. We have positioned the Chronica Sola Verse as an ever-growing metaverse that allows new games, expansions, and projects to be built side-by-side. Each new game will utilize the same NFT assets and native CHRO token – with Wyndblast being the first game to launch.

Our metaverse model aims to build a gaming ecosystem that does not follow other games' typical boom & bust cycle. By allowing the same NFT assets and tokens to be used in all games we aim to keep our player-based engaged, excited, and involved in all aspects of our development!


playtoearn, play to earn, play and earn, p2e, avalanche, avax, chro, bitcoin, avaxnft, nft
